entry.tran: (问题、目光)洞察真相的，质问的
entry.def: A searching question or look is intended to discover the truth about something.

example.ex: They asked her some searching questions on moral philosophy and logic.
example.tran: 他们深入询问了她一些有关伦理学和逻辑学的问题。
